casebody.data:
Clark, II
v.
Department of Public Safety 190P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 27, 2016 Joseph Earl Clark, II, for Clark, Joseph Earl (II).

Kristin Jo Uicker, Attorney at Law, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of May 2016 by Petitioner for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of May 2016."
